repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.6-slim 

ENV DJANGO_VERSION 1.11.5 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
gcc \
gettext \
git \
mysql-client \
libmysqlclient-dev \
postgresql-client \
libpq-dev \
libjpeg62 \
libjpeg62-turbo-dev \
netcat \
supervisor \
sqlite3 \
\--no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
&& mkdir -p /var/www/app

EXPOSE 8000 

WORKDIR /var/www/app 

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir django=="$DJANGO_VERSION" \
gunicorn \
psycopg2 \
uwsgi

CMD []
